verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: ARLINGTON , Va.] -- [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: marked] [ARG1: his second Memorial Day] [ARGM-PRD: as commander in chief] [ARGM-MNR: by laying a wreath at the Tomb of the Unknown Soldier during a solemn ceremony at Arlington National Cemetery] .

ARLINGTON , Va. -- [ARG0: President Donald Trump] marked his second Memorial Day as commander in chief by [V: laying] [ARG1: a wreath] [ARG2: at the Tomb of the Unknown Soldier] [ARGM-TMP: during a solemn ceremony at Arlington National Cemetery] .
